text:
Foreign unit marketing has very competitive vinyl floor prices. Vincent their boss is a very patient and down to earth man who clarified many of my queries. They do not have fancy showrooms like Evorich, but their warehouse is pretty large.

He is a traditional man who does not know how to do advertising on social media. So when I couldn't find any reviews of this company I had lots of doubts. But he patiently addressed many of them and even arranged a site visit to one of his residential projects. When I spoke to the house owner who said it was his second time doing vinyl flooring Vincent, I was more assured. I would do vinyl flooring with them in the future
Great product for their vinyl floor. Price reasonable and their materials is more durable compare with other that we have seem.

Incredibly helpful friendly,efficient and knowledgeable staff on vast range of flooring, giving options and prices for different types.
lend samples   Of flooring for choice  of selection,extremely great workmanship I felt they genuinely cared and valued us as customers and  I would recommend them 100%  to others and deserve 5 stars,excellent and outstanding customer service.

Did up our new home and decided to use Snow White vinyl tiles by Foreign Unique. Best decision ever! Service was prompt and price was unexpectedly reasonable, for the excellent quality of tiles and detailed workmanship. I have kids, so the tiles were surprisingly durable and its water-resistant feature is a huge plus point for us. Our house looks amazing! Highly recommended.

Renovations on my marble flooring are being done with vinyl flooring. They did an excellent job. My floor began to move once more. I appreciate you helping me move the furnishings. Very strongly advised...
